column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Went for lunch on a weekday. Even though there were a good amount of people there
column2: we got our seats pretty quickly. The waitress checked on us pretty frequently to see if we were ready to order. After we placed our order
column3: it took a long time for our food to come out. In the mean time
column4: our waitress was nowhere to be found when we wanted more water. When our food came out
column5: both the 2 pieces of meat and the egg were cold and the soup was lukewarm. The noodle was decent (in that they were not super soggy). I would not be going back again.
